entry.title: blog function test
entry.content: mathjax test. f(x)= \begin{cases} 0& \text{x=0}\\\\ 1& \text{x!=0} \end{cases}When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to (ax^2 + bx + c = 0) and they are x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.code highlight test. 123456#include <iostream>int main(){ std::cout<<"hello world! hello hexo."<<std:endl;} 123shell code$ hexo deploy$ npm install img insert test
